name: B-Laze!
description:
Oh no, your beehive procrastinated! Quick, organize bee swarms to collect enough pollen for the winter. 
Gather big swarms to melt snow and fry these mischievous hornets before they steal your yummies!
That's right, fry. Just like bees would in real life!
...
(Context)

This game was made for the first Brackeys Game Jam of 2021 in 7 days!

- Time attack: it's not a puzzle, think fast!
- Frantic resource-management: distribute your bees to maximize time savings and pollen collection! Sacrifice power for time, or time for power!
- Innovative unit creation method: a slider and a drag-and-drop in one! Get your bees rolling out instantly.
- Too fast? Make it slower! Too slow? Make it faster, both on the fly!
- 15 upgrades that can make your life easier!

Call free bees to work from the bottom bar.
Drag bee swarms with the mouse. You can merge them together, but can't separate.
Collect pollen from flowers! When a swarm has a low number, move it to the hive.
Bigger swarms recover slower!
Snowstorms are rare but nasty... Hide your bees! Or at least thaw the ones that freeze...
Hornets will try to steal from your hive... Bring enough bees to fight! If there are too few, the fight won't end in your favour.

And don't forget: press [SPACE] to change game speed.  You can slow the game down! Or speed it up, if you wish.
